p1.title: >USA: U.S. Treasury balances at Fed rose on Aug 18.
p1.detail: U.S. Treasury balances at Federal Reserve based on Treasury Department's latest budget statement. (BILLIONS OF DLRS) Aug 18 Aug 15 Fed acct 4.621 3.876 Tax/loan note acct 12.144 6.214 Cash balance 16.765 10.090 --- Total public debt, subject to limit 5,310.293 5,208.507 --- Treasury said individual income tax refunds valued at $2 million were issued and $304 million of corporate refunds were issued.
